caption: Ryan O'Byrne, in conjunction his youth sports society (Ryan O'Byrne Youth Sports Society), KidSport Greater Victoria (a non-profit organization) and the NHLPA, gave under-privileged kids brand new hockey gear.  The NHLPA donated 28 sets of gear for the deserving kids and O'Byrne will host his charity camp in a few weeks, with all proceeds going to KidSport Greater Victoria, a non-profit organization whose goal is to ensure that kids from low-income families can participate in a season of athletics.
